title: Tofu and vegetable stir fry with peanut sauce
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon peanut oil', '1 small head broccoli, chopped', '1 small red pepper, chopped', '5 fresh mushrooms, sliced', '450g tofu, cubed', '130g peanut butter', '120ml hot water', '2 tablespoons vinegar', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 1/2 tablespoons treacle', 'cayenne pepper, to taste']
